Name: Froth Blower Cocktail
Ingredients: 30 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: Salmon-pink and very frothy but surprisingly complex and tasty.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Froth Blower Cocktail contains 148 calories
